item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Flyleaf - New Horizons (iTunes bonus track version) / Lossless
item.description:
if its possible, i want this album in apple lossless, please! (the full album, not just the bonus track)
https://music.apple.com/us/album/new-horizons/1440812477
item.author: Venus Fly Trap
